h2_title: Where to Find the Apramana Bat
content: A much larger gold variant of the Apramana Bats you can encounter elsewhere in Chapter 3, the Apramana Bat boss can be found once you leave the Turtle Island. From the North Shore of Bitter Lake, head right from the Shrine and along the coast until you come upon the skeletal remains of the Snake General. Once you arrive where his skull is located, the giant bat will ambush you.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Apramana_Bat.md", within the section "Apramana Bat" and the sub-section "Where to Find the Apramana Bat". The content is presented below:

A much larger gold variant of the Apramana Bats you can encounter elsewhere in Chapter 3, the Apramana Bat boss can be found once you leave the Turtle Island. From the North Shore of Bitter Lake, head right from the Shrine and along the coast until you come upon the skeletal remains of the Snake General. Once you arrive where his skull is located, the giant bat will ambush you.
